Newark.Seton Hall University College of Nursing: The Seton Hall University College of Nursing is one of the eight schools and colleges of Seton Hall University, the Catholic University of New Jersey, and is located in South Orange. The SHU College of Nursing was the first school in New Jersey and the first Catholic school on the east coast to offer an undergraduate program in nursing. Seton Hall's graduate nursing program is also ranked as one of the top 100 in the nation by US News & World Report.
